msbt.message: Can I take a guess what you're doing with that shovel? You're gonna do dirt lifts, ! Do a few hundred hours of those and your arms'll be HUGE!
A watering can! Hey, when those things are full, they're a great workout for your arm muscles. What? You're not training? Then why are you holding it, ?
Cool umbrella! Its curved lines and sleek design tell me that you have very particular tastes. Don't look at me like that! I swear I'm mostly not just quoting a thing I heard someone else say!

When your axe hits the wood, it's a great sound, huh?The vibration that moves through your arm when you make contactIt's like you're giving your muscles a wake-up call.Well, that's what it seems like to me anyway, !
Pulling a slingshot band as far back as you can It's really great training, don't you think, ?What I need is a slingshot that only does the pulling part. I don't need all that flinging business.
That thing you're holding can just transform anyone's clothes, right?How about, uhtransforming my clothes into a superhero costume?, on the scene!<10_4 /> Just kidding, !
Oh! Building a road? You're really going all-out, !You should make the path one big circle. Then everyone could run laps!
Are you trying to make a cliff?I think you're on to something! Rock climbing is a great way to get big, bulging arm muscles!
Making a river, ? I love playing in rivers!Swimming upstream is great for the ol' delts. Just the best!Just don't overdo it, alright? I like swimming, but I don't wanna swim EVERYWHERE. !
Hey, whatcha doing with that party popper in your hand?Were you going to sneak up behind me and pop it?S-stop it! Those things startle me like crazy, !
Whoa! Nice ladder, ! You setting up a high dive or something?Hey, what's your favorite dive?<10_4 /> Me? I like the dectuple twisting pike. They're super easy!

Oh, nice! I had no idea you were into pole vaulting! No wonder you've got those diamond abs, !So, you gonna go down to the beach and vault over the island?<10_4 /> No? Just rivers? That's cool too, I guess.
Ooh, you've got one of those tweeter things!Did you know that even something little like that can give you a core workout? Go nuts, !
Cool bubble blower you've got there, !Think you can blow a bubble as big as me? Then I can pop it and it'll be a fair fight, .
Hey, cool pinwheel! Have you tried running with it, ?The faster you run, the faster it spins. But remember to take breaks. <10_4 />For the pinwheel's sake!

Hey, that's a fancy fan you've got there, .I like that kind of fan because it gives you a workout at the same time as it cools you down.Then you just need a second one to cool down your arms. I guess you could use your legs to wave it
Whoa, is that one of those sparklers? Those things get me PUMPED!<10_10 />321BLAMMO!!!<10_9 />Oh. Maybe I overhyped it just a tiny bit.
Sweet balloon, !You wanna know a great workout? Let that thing go on a windy day, and then chase it around!
You're holding a net, somy powers of deduction tell me you're out here catching bugs, . Huh? You haven't caught anything? Don't worry! This is the kind of thing where passion prevails! You'll do it!
! How are those bugs treating you, ?I don't think you've hit your stride yet, but don't worry about it. It's all about the journey!
How goes it? Getting the hang of the ol' bug-catching thing?Float like a bee, sting like a butterfly! That's the secret to catching bugs!
Hey, you've really upped your bug-catching game lately!You're starting to look like a natural with that net in your hand. Just work on those biceps, .

! Looks like you've caught every type of bug you can catch!Wow! You've gotta have huge arms to wrestle all those bugs out of the air!What? They're all super light?Well, I can tell your arms are getting bigger anyway, !
Going fishing, eh? You're a real go-getter, !Um Huh?! You haven't caught a single thing! Did your go-getter just now get going, ?

Timing is the key to fishing, right? You gotta yank the pole at just the right time and wrestle that fish!Fishing offers brute-strength training you just can't get anywhere elseI have no idea what I'm talking about right now! I'm just saying stuff I saw on a sports show, .
Everything going swimmingly?The key to fishing is to sneak up on your prey with your stealth muscles, !
You're starting to look like a natural with that fishing rod in your hand.It's like you're glowing with the aura of someone who's landed a few big catches, .

What?! You've caught every type of fish you can catch, ?Now that's something else! I was wondering how your lats and delts were getting so ripped. I'm jealous!I gotta know, If you could bench press one fish, which would it be?
